head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LENAHAN, DANIEL V.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LENAHAN, DANIEL V.

block.p: LENAHAN-Daniel V. On August 14, 1998. A Major of US Air Force, Retired. Alumnus of Fordham University. Loving husband of Georgiana. Beloved father of Georgiana V., Peter, Daniel Jr., Mark and Paul Lenahan. Cherished grandfather of seven and great-grandfather of one. Reposing Monday 24 and 7-9 PM, at Riverdale-on-Hudson Funeral Home, 6110 Riverdale Avenue. Funeral services Tuesday, 11 AM, at Woodlawn Cemetery Chapel. In lieu of flowers, donations to Calvary Hospital, 1740 Eastchester Rd, Bronx, NY 10461, would be greatly appreciated.
